channel.title: Authors | Eduard de Boer (Dutch Photographer)
channel.copyright: Â© 2020 Eduard de Boer -- All rights reserved

item.description:
Eduard de Boer is a worldwide operating Google Street View Trusted Photographer since the beginning of 2013.

He has shot hundreds of local businesses in the Netherlands. In 2016 he expanded his work for Google Street View to The Gambia, the smallest country in Africa.

Check out his work for Google Street View in The Gambia.
